AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js) Other extensions used: | non

comment.body: Custom userscripts and third-party filters don't cause the problem. It is caused by `custom userscripts and third-party filters` in  stealth mode.
